name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
	t1.`BEGIN`,
	'' AS `BEGINSTR`,
	t1.`BRANCH`,
	(
	(
SELECT
	count( t.id ) 
FROM
	zt_bug t 
WHERE
	t.deleted = '0' 
	AND t.product = t1.product 
	AND (
	t.plan = t1.ID 
	OR (
	t.plan IN ( SELECT t2.ID FROM zt_productplan t2 WHERE t2.deleted = '0' AND t2.parent = t1.ID ) 
	) 
	) 
	) 
	) AS `BUGCNT`,
	t1.`CREATEBY`,
	'' AS `DELAY`,
	t1.`DELETED`,
	t1.`DEPT`,
	'' AS `DURATION`,
	t1.`END`,
	'' AS `ENDSTR`,
	'' AS `FUTURE`,
	t1.`ID`,
	'' AS `ISEXPIRED`,
	t1.`ORG`,
	t1.`PARENT`,
	t1.`PRODUCT`,
	t1.`STATUS`,
	'' AS `STATUSS`,
	(
	(
SELECT
	COUNT( t.id ) 
FROM
	zt_story t 
WHERE
	t.deleted = '0' 
	AND t.product = t1.product 
	AND (
	t.plan = t1.ID 
	OR (
	t.plan IN ( SELECT t2.ID FROM zt_productplan t2 WHERE t2.parent = t1.ID AND t2.deleted = '0' ) 
	) 
	) 
	) 
	) AS `STORYCNT`,
	t1.`TITLE`,
  t1.PRODUCTPLANSN	
FROM
	`zt_productplan` t1
	LEFT JOIN `zt_productplan` t11 ON t1.`PARENT` = t11.`ID`
